a:1:{s:9:"spip_jobs";a:10:{s:5:"field";a:9:{s:6:"id_job";s:34:"bigint(21) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT";s:10:"descriptif";s:13:"text NOT NULL";s:8:"fonction";s:21:"varchar(255) NOT NULL";s:4:"args";s:17:"longblob NOT NULL";s:7:"md5args";s:28:"char(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT ''";s:7:"inclure";s:21:"varchar(255) NOT NULL";s:8:"priorite";s:32:"smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0'";s:4:"date";s:47:"datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00'";s:6:"status";s:31:"tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1'";}s:3:"key";a:3:{s:11:"PRIMARY KEY";s:6:"id_job";s:8:"KEY date";s:4:"date";s:10:"KEY status";s:6:"status";}s:5:"exist";b:1;s:9:"table_sql";s:9:"spip_jobs";s:5:"table";s:9:"spip_jobs";s:9:"connexion";s:0:"";s:5:"titre";s:22:"'' as titre,'' as lang";s:4:"date";s:4:"date";s:6:"statut";s:0:"";s:16:"tables_jointures";a:1:{i:0;s:10:"jobs_liens";}}}
